content: the crochet **waffle heart washcloth** is a squishy and textured dishcloth that will bring all the love into your kitchen > the pattern of the waffle heart > washcloth is featured in the winter > washcloth series 2024 with 31 awesome > dishcloth patterns for the entire > year take a look at the collection > ** here 1 ** perfect to crochet for valentine s day this washcloth can also make a cute gift for a friend or loved one the pdf pattern includes written instructions a photo tutorial and a link to a video tutorial on how to crochet the c2c waffle stitch *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 0 mm g/6 us 8 uk crochet hook light worsted 4 medium yarn tapestry needle **yarn** 133 yds 122 m of **lion brand coboo** 232 yds / 212 m per 100 g or 144 yds 132 m of **king cole bamboo cotton** 252 yds / 230 m per 100 g feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 11 2 28 5 cm at the largest point by 11 4 29 cm in height **gauge** 21 sts per 12 row in 4 10 cm in waffle stitch **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusa--twobrothersblankets thrivecart com/2024-winter-washcloths-bundle/
